05/22/2023 Team Member: Based on Stop Loss product on Snowflake. In UA at this time (not production).

Group Names: Unum Group/DTO Organization/Enterprise Shared Services/Enterprise Data & Insights
Outcomes: Time to Market; Reliability; Predictability
Notes:
09/14/2023 Team Member: Based on Stop Loss product on Snowflake. In UA at this time (not production). Largely SQL script based, no packaged libraries. Feature branches are committed to every day, not Main every day. A branch does not last more than a work week before it is merged and deprecated. There is no dependency on large merges.
Trailblazers regularly meet and collaborate on effective practices. 
Trailblazers has short-lived (days) feature branches with at least daily merges to mainline.
Criteria: Software Engineers commit local branches to version control at least once a day
